content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at position (5.0, 5.0)
Consists of:
- Furnace used to process iron ore and coal into iron plates.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at position (-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
- Furnace used to process copper ore and coal into copper plates.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API usage errors with get_entities:
  - Ensure calls to get_entities follow its defined signature. Avoid unexpected keyword arguments (e.g. "radius") and supplying positional arguments when none are expected.
  
• Placement failures for Lab structures:
  - Confirm that required inventory items exist before attempting placement to prevent errors such as “No lab in inventory.”

• Crafting dependency issues for Lab production:
  - Verify resource availability for all required sub-ingredients (e.g. iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, copper-cable) and support multi-level crafting prerequisites by ensuring associated smelting or crafting processes complete successfully.

• Iteration on non-iterable (None) values:
  - Initialize or validate variables expected to be iterable to avoid 'NoneType' errors during iteration.
